title: PBE login
body:
Hi,
I just wanted to ask how to get into pbe now. When i start the client and select pbe i still get redirected to the EUW server. I have to enter my normal riot account and then it should work or am I doing something wrong?
I haven't tried it out in a while but wanted to test the new tft set.
Hope somebody can help.

replies.body: Same for me, can't understand why it doesn't work...

> [{quoted}](name=Eddey15,realm=EUW,application-id=7hciEY9w,discussion-id=jFcAIQs4,comment-id=,timestamp=2020-03-04T02:47:11.481+0000)
>
> Hi,
> I just wanted to ask how to get into pbe now. When i start the client and select pbe i still get redirected to the EUW server. I have to enter my normal riot account and then it should work or am I doing something wrong?
> I haven't tried it out in a while but wanted to test the new tft set.
> Hope somebody can help.

Same for me
